entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `IAsyncConfigureOptions` to allow configuring options asyncronosly #97575
  • [API Proposal]: Get a Read-only view of a StringBuilder body and clear the StringBuilder. #97570
  • TypeNameParser API #97566
    9.0.0
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed #97565
  • Regular high HTTP response times with HTTPClientFactory #97562
  • [API Proposal]: Support await'ing a Task<T> without throwing #97556
  • SerialStream discards 'numBytes', resulting in data loss #97549
  • [wasm][mt] WS timeouts #97546
    9.0.0
  • [browser] GC - Assertion: should not be reached - simple_nursery_serial_scan_object #97543
    9.0.0
  • BerConverter does not use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder APIs #97540
  • After Upgrade vom 8.0.0 to 8.0.1 => Automaticly restarted service is not working #97538
  • JIT: CSE of an address computation can result in a write barrier change #97534
    Future
  • NegotiateStream_StreamToStream_Authentication_EmptyCredentials_Fails fails with The credentials supplied to the package were not recognized #97530

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm can't read Azure Storage Tables directly, it needs azure functions or controllers. #59098
    Future
  • [Arch Linux] workload 'android' missing on .NET 8 Linux #97319
    8.0.x
  • Createdump will incorrectly try to classify memfd entries as files #90547
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' during 'Post-Morph' #97524
    9.0.0
  • [Bug / Unclear Specs] Strings starting with '1' (0x31) are identical to strings starting with '𑁒' (\U00011052) #97544
  • tcp-throughput regression (localhost) with NetworkStream.ReadAsync()/WriteAsync() from .net 6.0.26 to .net 8.0.1 #97554
  • `QuicConnection.DisposeAsync` throws `OperationCanceledException` #78641
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression.SubReadStream Read Makes Unnecessary Calls #95450
  • [API Proposal]: Allow replace ArrayPool<T>.Shared to custom pool #97512
  • [browser][MT] RangePartitionerTests.RunPartitionerStaticTest_SingleChunking timeout #97440
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Partitioner1Chunk.IterationsWithDependency timeout #97396
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `TaskIDFromExternalContextTest` fails, Task has a negative ID #91583
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `TestParallelScheduler` fails, TaskScheduler.Default not used when no ParallelOptions are specified. #91582
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `ExceptionOnMoveNext` fails, wrong exception type #91581
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `SimultaneousStopBreakTests` fails #91579
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Transactions`, `System.Threading` timeouts #91541
    9.0.0
  • Trapping Exceptions Performance in .NET Core 3 #13054
    Future
  • ICorDebugFunction5::DisableOpimizations causes target app to be terminated on Linux #97461

PullRequests

Created

  • Split up loader heap implementations #97577
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Testing CI - ignore this #97574
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Display names of handles in dumps #97573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add TensorPrimitives.ConvertTruncating/Saturating/Checked #97572
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • updating area ownership within mono and coreclr #97571
    area-Meta
  • Refactor how the embedded rounding is handled so the logic is more reusable #97569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97568
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97560
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Replace SPKI hashing with a managed implementation #97559
    area-System.Security
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_DE_1A group #97557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97553
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Exclude tests for Apple platforms on hybrid mode #97550
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][mt] Move FeatureWasmThreads to Directory.Build.props #97548
    area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • [browser][MT] Enable `DerivedCancellationTokenSource`, `AbandonExisting` #97545
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 #97536
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce locking around TypeVarTypeDesc creation #97531
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Avoiding loading and processing same cert file to improve cold start performance … #97267
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete some CompatibilitySuppressions #97503
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete more dead code in native AOT libs #97547
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Various createdump fixes and cleanup #97253
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Merge fgRemoveConditionalJump and fgOptimizeBranchToNext #97456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Inline tls access on linux/x64 #97413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add regex test suggested by recent fix #97532
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: Improve consistency around indir flags; directly copy flags in `gtCloneExpr` #97541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix big-endian check in eglib #97564
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Use correct registers set for fast tail call when function needs GSCookie check #97510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CZ_4A to IF_SVE_CZ_4A_L group #97393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [PERF] Remove Mono Android Device Startup testing from performance testing. #97484
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Bump to new Ubuntu 22.04 queue for PPC64 #97555
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize lsra for MinOpts #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: capture all write barrier helper addresses for SPMI #97535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Utilise small atomics in Parallel #97528
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][mt] Fix few libraries projects #97539
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][tests] Disabling crashing System.Linq tests on ios-like platforms #97511
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Factor loop duplication code #97506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Fix System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel build #97505
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove helper frames #97469
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97479
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97476
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #2 #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HW_4A` to `SVE_HW_4B_D` #97433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #96687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove most fgConnectFallThrough calls #97488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use non locking atomic intrinsics #97527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Disable inlining into bblocks that are detected as dead early during codegen #97514
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.216, windows: 120.0.6099.217 #96949
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Improve performance of Order{By}{Descending}(...).First/Last #97483
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Tweak Enumerable.ToArray to reduce some overheads #97458
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Improve `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2397

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for diffing LLVM bitcode to `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2496
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not create useless 'alloca's for shadow locals #2495
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 赶快把还原到.Net6 版本的支持！！！！！！！！你们和他妈傻逼一样，老子用.Net6 写了项目上线正式环境，你们更新把.net6 强制移除了，必须更新.net8.老子他妈的项目，现在出问题了，打不开。换到.net8 打包好了，客户机器上又打不开。 #38285
  • [WebToolsE2E][Aspire] After installing .NET SDK 9.0, the 'microsoft.net.sdk.aspire' folder is not included by default and needs to be manually updated workload using CLI to appear. #38284
  • Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Failed to remove Microsoft.Emscripten Error: 0x00000643. Fatal error during installation. #38280

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Skip flaky tests #38307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix merged test asset folder #38305
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Installer merge main update reference #38304
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Static web assets] Unskip test #38261
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix typo in StaticWebAsset.cs #34818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress vstest terminal logger via environment variable #38286
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move `PackageOutputPath` initialization to NuGet's Pack targets #10733
    breaking-change, stale
  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat, stale
  • [23250] - dotnet test boolean flags options fixed #27262
    Area-DotNet Test, stale
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console, Area-Watch, stale
  • Make the ImplicitUsings feature minimally define each imported namespace #25225
    Area-NetSDK, stale
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-Compilers, stale
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Rename _EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting to EnableNativeHostActivation #23159
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch, stale
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • New: Add the ability to run concurrent client connections #16048
    Area-Watch, stale
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow for GenAPI to include additional API #38232
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
    11.0
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Proposal: in-set and in-range operator to ease checking of value within a pre-defined set #420
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • Extension lowering #7771

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust `params` type requirements based on recent LDM decisions (params-collections.md) #7879

Merged

  • Update ref struct interfaces based on LDM discussions #7865
  • Params parameters are implicitly `scoped` #7868
  • Add native lock speclet #7849
  • Minor update to CLs WG notes #7872
  • Update LDM agenda #7875
  • Update `Metadata` section in params-collections.md #7850

Updated

  • Publish notes from extensions WG 2024-01-25 #7874

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade to Arcade 9 #71827
  • [VB] `CInt(Math.Round(doubleValue, MidPointRounding.AwayFromZero))` and `CInt` for rounding methods for `Decimal` are not optimized #71819
  • [VB] Remove redundant `Call` #71818
  • Add `IParameterSymbol.IsParamCollection` property #71816

Closed

  • Implement abstract class code fix does not consider nullability for dynamic #70623
    Backlog
  • Initializing a ConcurrentBag with a dynamic variable using a collection initializer results in MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #71703
    17.10
  • Primary constructor parameters do not work with MemberNotNull attributes #71710
  • Update DocumentationCommentId.CreateDeclarationId to return null instead of throw. #71460
  • Feature "Document highlights" fails with exception when navigating in code using pointers #70159
  • [Bug] Only allow a single instance of VS telemetry in the language server #71101

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing #71829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add strong contract assertion about project syncing #71828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure related docs in the preview workspace link to same sourcetext #71825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always return the same instance when asking for the same frozen doc snapshot from a solution. #71822
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for arrays #71820
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71817
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add test demonstrating correct behavior #71821
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make dynamic nullable if its type was annotated to be nullable when generating its type syntax #71813
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into ParamsCollections #71824
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move type to its own file #71823
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use collection expressions for builder patterns. #71814
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating doc comment IDs #71811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Avoid unnecessary temporary builders when creating syntax lists. #71799
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional tests suggested from code review #71815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71808
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Load Roslyn DevKit assemblies into the default ALC #71807
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating strings #71812
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #69469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Epic] Improve the Data Protection experience for apps with multiple instances #53654
    9.0.0
  • Error AuthenticationStateProvider in Net8 #53651
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53649
  • Perf regression: json, json #53648
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53647
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #53646
  • Blazor page route set to "/bin" causes 404 Error when published to Azure #53645
  • Flaky test SignalR.StackExchangeRedis.Tests.RedisEndToEndTests.CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesUserNameWithPatternIsTreatedAsLiteral #53644
  • http client is very slow ib blazor .net 8 #53643
  • [Blazor] Security recommendations for Blazor apps using Server Components with Websocket compression enables #53640
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ProblemDetails no longer serializes to JSON in RFC 7807 compliant casing in .NET 8 #53639
  • Blazor needs a "Angualr Hydration" similiar feature #53635
  • AllowedValuesAttribute mesage doesn't get localize because its missing its AttributeAdapter #53632
  • Minimal API with IFormFile throws when Content-Type header is missing or empty #53630
  • [KeyboardEventArgs] Include JavaScript properties #53629
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter, single_query #53627
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, json #53626
  • [ASP.NET Core MVC - Movie Database tutorial] SqlNullValueException: Data is Null' error occurs after adding the [Required] attribute to the 'Rating' field in a Movie class while working on 'Part 9: Adding Validation to an ASP.NET Core MVC App.' #53624

Closed

  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted: The payload was invalid #47774
  • [DataProtection] Lack of multitenancy is a blocker #53455
  • Re-enable blazor tests in 6.0 after 17.4 msbuild fix is in #44526
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #52915
  • `InvalidOperationException` occurs on `onsubmit` event when using `NavigateTo` method with non-ASCII characters on Blazor SSR render mode. #52438
    8.0.x
  • ASP.NET Core SPA Templates Need Better Options for Authentication #42158
    Discussions
  • .net8 UsePathBase fails to change the pathbase #53612
  • HttpClient behaves differently between Blazor Server and Blazor WebAssembly Projects with regard to Cookies #53609
  • Status code is not updated in middleware #53561
  • After Upgrade vom 8.0.0 to 8.0.1 => Automaticly restarted service is not working #53582

PullRequests

Created

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix XML docs in EndpointFilterInvocationContext.cs #53655
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53642
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix stale values from `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` #53625
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #53539
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96cd50c` to `6a59382` #53634
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53623
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update startvscode.cmd #53607
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24074.8 #53602
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Enable regex constraint on the Blazor router #53533
    area-blazor
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

  • iOS Binding Does Nothing #14775

    Backlog
  • Animated gifs do not start initially #7019

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Loading specific columns without creating additional mapping classes #32935
  • Little nitpick with the documentation of OperationException #32934
  • Parameter value mixup #32932
  • AsNoTracking with IdentityResolution doesn't work if a reference navigation is projected #32929
  • Make our SQL tree fully immutable #32927

Closed

  • Cannot configure Many to Many Relationship correctly #32933
  • Regression: GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #32772
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design 8.0.0-rc.2.23480.1 requires Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces = 4.5.0 #32070
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version #32926
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support resetting SQL Server IDENTITY #32931
  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930
  • [release/8.0] Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32928
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32925
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443
  • Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32924
  • Updating Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version to 4.8 #32922
  • Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32920
